byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and JESSE McKINLEY

abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo and New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio receive praise for largely effective coordinated response to blizzard, signaling rare moment of accord between leaders; travel ban is credited with helping to avoid mishaps and overall strategy may provide model for future storms.
lead_paragraph: As Mayor Bill de Blasio and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo were lauded for their coordinated response to the storm, the mayor sought to head off criticism that streets in Queens were seemingly untouched.

headline.main: De Blasio and Cuomo Find Rare Harmony in Blizzard Response
headline.print_headline: De Blasio and Cuomo Find Rare Harmony in Storm Response

snippet: As Mayor Bill de Blasio and Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo were lauded for their coordinated response to the storm, the mayor sought to head off criticism that streets in Queens were seemingly untouched.
